players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for them to end this quickly."
Charlie: "Bob, I think you're just trying to frame me. If you're really the detective, why accuse so quickly? Maybe you're the mafioso yourself."
Charlie: "Bob, your quick accusation feels off—maybe you're hiding something. Diana, why the silence? Let's discuss before voting."
You: "Charlie, you're the mafioso, and my investigation proves it. We can't afford to let you manipulate us further."
